mapper.insert: insert into tbl_tran_history (transactionHistoryId, stage, money, expectedDate, createTime, createBy, transactionId) values (#{transactionhistoryid,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{stage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{money,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{expecteddate,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createby,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transactionid,jdbcType=CHAR})
mapper.update: update tbl_tran_history set stage = #{stage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, money = #{money,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, expectedDate = #{expecteddate,jdbcType=CHAR}, createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=CHAR}, createBy = #{createby,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, transactionId = #{transactionid,jdbcType=CHAR} where transactionHistoryId = #{transactionhistoryid,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select: select transactionHistoryId, stage, money, expectedDate, createTime, createBy, transactionId from tbl_tran_history
